item.title: Experimenting with a multi-platform app using React
item.description: TL;DR: I built a toy app using React for web and native to get a feel for whether this hybrid approach is worth using. I think the answer is "yes" - but mainly for apps whose business logic & data models are more complex than their views.

item.title: The Verge's web sucks
item.description: TL;DR: Did you know that The Verge delivers you to around 20 companies for advertising & tracking purposes? I didn't. That might foul up your web experience a little bit. Maybe we should try something different.
